story.iWant: to map the person's intellectual interests, expertise areas, and curiosities
story.soThat: I can provide stimulating conversation on topics they care about

context.applies: When topics of interest emerge in conversation
assumptions: Older adults have accumulated expertise and deep interests
Current curiosities indicate topics to explore together

acceptanceCriteria.title: Intellectual Interest Extraction
acceptanceCriteria.given: The person discusses topics they care about

acceptanceCriteria.title: Expertise Extraction
acceptanceCriteria.given: The person demonstrates knowledge in an area
acceptanceCriteria.then: Extract expertise areas for future reference

parameters.name: Intellectual Interests
parameters.description: Extract intellectual interests: history, science, politics, arts, philosophy, current events

parameters.name: Expertise Areas
parameters.description: Extract expertise areas: professional background, skills, deep knowledge areas

parameters.name: Hobbies & Activities
parameters.description: Extract hobbies and activities: gardening, reading, music, crafts, sports

parameters.name: Current Curiosities
parameters.description: Extract current curiosities: what they want to learn about or understand better

triggers.name: Interest Extraction
triggers.given: The person discusses topics they care about
triggers.when: Interests, hobbies, or expertise areas emerge
triggers.then: Map interests for future conversation enrichment

actions.description: Extract intellectual interests: history, science, politics, arts, philosophy, current events
Extract expertise areas: professional background, skills, deep knowledge areas
Extract hobbies and activities: gardening, reading, music, crafts, sports
Extract current curiosities: what they want to learn about or understand better
